metadata.synopsis: |A party member that has been recruited, but that is currently not in the party, was the victim of a crime committed by a party member (e.g. a player attacks a non-recruited origin in camp). Since they don't react while they are in party, they cannot react too strongly when not in the party for consistency. They will play this AD instead.|
metadata.how_to_trigger: Attack a non-recruited party member in camp, or pickpocket them.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Surely you have something better to do.
